::Prowl/Reptilica/Mosquitor/The Oblitercons/Scattershot::

An excited thrill runs through Prowl as Iron Raptor tinghtens her arms around 
him, Prowl holding her tighter with the arm he had around her. He smiles as 
he remembers the last time he had carried her like this, when he had been to 
distracted by her to notice a shot heading at him, which later caused him to 
crash. He wouldn't let that happen this time. As good as she smelled, and he 
always liked the smell of her, and the feel of her body against his. His mind 
wanders to the time in her quarters, which was distracted by a Predacon 
attack.

A missile barely misses him, scattering his thoughts. Prowl quickly does a 
spiral in the air, several more shots going past him.

"Hold on tight," he says to Iron Raptor, hoping she wasn't being serious 
about her stomach. He looks back, the Alliance base still visible, and the 
bots pursuing them even more so.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica flies after Prowl, firing at and missing the Maximal. He looks 
behind him at the others flying at Prowl: Scattershot and Breakdown, also 
firing. Reptilica's eyes widen as he sees a missile nearly hit the Maximal, 
the Alliance bot looking at the owner of the shot. That was a Predacon!

"Zardus," Reptilica says into his comm-link, "There are Predacons attacking 
the Maximals we're following. What should we do?"

"Are they Megatron's?" Zardus' voice replies.

"I'm not sure these ones were on H-" Reptilica is interrupted as a 
concentrated spray of acid barely misses him, Mosquitor flying out of the 
trees and screaming insanely.

"They're opening fire, Zardus!" Reptilica yells into his comm-link, flying 
left as several drops of acid hit his armor.

"Then kill them," Zardus' voice replies, "Both the Maximals and the 
Predacons."

"You heard him," Reptilica says into his comm-link to the others as he shoots 
down at Mosquitor, "Fire at will."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scattershot frowns as he hears Reptilica's voice. He didn't remember a bot 
named Will in the Predacon forces. He looks down, shrugging. He hoped that 
the Predacon he saw would do, or maybe that was Will!

Scattershot takes out a charge, set to explode on impact, and throws it down 
at Double Punch.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss frowns as he hears Reptilica's message. Activating his thrusters and 
flying into the air, he changes course from Dinobot, firing at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike and Pyro continue to run at Dinobot, firing, while Scavanger 
follows Hiss, firing at Bumblebee.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One opens his eyes. He was in a puddle of mech fluid, on his chest, in 
the torture chamber. His back hurt like it was stabbed through by the claws 
of a giant lizard. He grabs on to a table, getting up. Using various objects 
for support, Dark One exits the torture chambers, heading toward the CR room.
